name: iran-divestment
description: Script to automate the Iran Divestment Act (IDA) process for direct pay invoices greater than $1,000. Using this script obviates the need for departments and vendors to sign an IDA Form with their invoices.

scripts.clean: rm -rf deploy/build && rm -rf deploy/.terraform && rm -rf deploy/.terraform.lock.hcl
scripts.runterraform: cd deploy/build && terraform init && terraform apply -auto-approve -var-file=../../.env
scripts.deploy: cd deploy && node deploy.js && npm install --prefix ./build/nodejs --omit-dev && npm run runterraform
scripts.destroy: cd deploy/build && terraform init && terraform destroy -auto-approve -var-file=../../.env
